name: JS Release | IDX 1.4.0
description: We have rolled out a version of the IDX basic theme that brings you some additions to the IDX basic theme page and some minor bug fixes.

ADDED.text: Support sending redirect after login URL in the query parameter.
Support for updating the color and label of Resend Button for MFA UI.
You can now  change the buttonâ€™s color in the UI for Phone login feature.

IMPROVED.text: The styling for the Social Login icon is updated.
